scenes.description: Kiryu Coco concludes her conversation with the Hololive 5th Generation members (Nene, Lamy, Polka, and Botan) during her graduation live, offering them final advice and encouragement as their senior.

subtitles.original: 「心配したのかな？」って来ないっすか？
subtitles.english: Doesn't it occur to you like, "Did she worry about us?"

subtitles.original: え？本当に？
subtitles.english: Huh? Really?

subtitles.original: 全然心配してないと思いますけど...
subtitles.english: I don't think you were worried at all, though...

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 皆さんにはそういうふうに印象に残ったお話を聞いたの本当初めてなんで、ちょっと嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: Well... this is my first time hearing how I've left a mark on you guys. It's making me a little happy to hear.

subtitles.original: じゃ、ラミィちゃん！ラミィちゃん、ラミィちゃん、最後ラミィちゃん。
subtitles.english: Okay, Lamy-chan! Lamy-chan, Lamy-chan, go next.

subtitles.original: ラミィはもう、ココ先輩のことプレスリリースから見てるんで。
subtitles.english: Well, I first started watching you from your press release.

subtitles.original: プレスリリース？！
subtitles.english: Since my press release?!

subtitles.original: あなたの第一印象いつからですか、それ！
subtitles.english: When exactly is your first impression, then?!

subtitles.original: プレスリリースですよ！
subtitles.english: From then!

subtitles.original: いや、とにかく凄かった！台風のような感じでプレスリリースから凄いインパクトがあったし！
subtitles.english: Anyway, it was incredible! Your impact starting with your press release was like a typhoon!

subtitles.original: それだけで身長がめちゃめちゃ高くて！
subtitles.english: Just for the fact that you were so tall!

subtitles.original: あ、それな！
subtitles.english: Oh, that!

subtitles.original: それな。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: 凄かったし。
subtitles.english: It was amazing.

subtitles.original: 初配信のインパクトも凄かったし。
subtitles.english: And your debut stream was very impactful, too.

subtitles.original: とにかくホロライブに完全に新しい風が吹きまくってた。
subtitles.english: Anyway, it was like you were a complete breath of fresh air for hololive.

subtitles.original: ビュービューしてたね。
subtitles.english: She blew right in.

subtitles.original: 褒められちゃってますね、これ。
subtitles.english: Oh! She's really praising me.

subtitles.original: でもココ会長が入ってだいぶ変わったよね、その今までの流れが本当に。
subtitles.english: But you really did shake things up when you joined.

subtitles.original: 俺らもさ、やっぱり5期生としてデビューしてわかるけど、新人としてデビューして、
subtitles.english: After we debuted as the 5th Generation, we can understand now how incredibly hard you had to work as a newcomer

subtitles.original: 先輩たちにあさココとかを協力してもらうの、どれだけ大変か入ってみてわかるじゃない？
subtitles.english: to get your seniors to collaborate with you on Morning Coco and things like that.

subtitles.original: 労力の使い方とかね。
subtitles.english: And how you made sure to be low-risk when featuring them.

subtitles.original: いや、本当に。初めてできた...なんていうか...
subtitles.english: Well, you guys were my first juniors, so how do I say...

subtitles.original: 遠慮なしにイジっていい後輩だったのでね、私にとって。
subtitles.english: I could tease you without any hesitation.

subtitles.original: 確かに。
subtitles.english: Certainly.

subtitles.original: 私はあさココとかで先輩をイジってきたりはしたけど...
subtitles.english: I mean, I teased my seniors in Morning Coco, too.

subtitles.original: 「顔面爆発したり頭剃ったりしていいですか？」って...
subtitles.english: But I had to ask like, "Excuse me, can I use this image of you with your face exploding?"

subtitles.original: 許可制だ。
subtitles.english: So you had to...

subtitles.original: そう、許可を求めたりしてたんです。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I had to ask them for permission and stuff.

subtitles.original: けど後輩に関しては「もういいか！」と思って。
subtitles.english: But for you guys, well, whatever!

subtitles.original: あんま聞かずに適当に爆破しちゃったりとかして。
subtitles.english: I could just blow you guys up without asking first.

subtitles.original: そうだった。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: 初コラボで会長に7回くらい爆破されましたもんね。
subtitles.english: My first collab was with you, and you really did blow me up. About seven times!

subtitles.original: 爆発したね！
subtitles.english: I did, didn't I?

subtitles.original: あの時はお互いに「どこまでいいんだろ」ってギクシャクしてたし。
subtitles.english: Back then, we were both really awkward, like... "Oh man, how far can I take it?"

subtitles.original: でも今はこうして普通に話せてるし。
subtitles.english: But now, we can talk together normally like this.

subtitles.original: ちょうど馴染んできた時だったのに...
subtitles.english: We all just got friendly with each other.

subtitles.original: 突然の卒業、すまんの！
subtitles.english: So I'm sorry for graduating so suddenly!

subtitles.original: 会長ーーー！！
subtitles.english: Chairman!

subtitles.original: 許す！許さねえ！許した！
subtitles.english: I forgive you! Unforgivable! I forgive you!

subtitles.original: あさココやってた時は、一番後輩の立場でやってたじゃないですか。
subtitles.english: When you were streaming Morning Coco, you were at the bottom of the totem pole, right?

subtitles.original: もちろんね。
subtitles.english: Absolutely.

subtitles.original: それでもホロメンを繋ぐハブとして機能してましたよね。
subtitles.english: But even then, you really brought people together. You were like a hub for all the hololive members.

subtitles.original: 5期生も会長みたいにならないとね、って思ってます。
subtitles.english: It makes me think that we in the 5th Gen need to be a little more like you.

subtitles.original: マジレス。素晴らしい。
subtitles.english: A srs bzns answer.

subtitles.original: 本当だ、そうだ。そうだ、そうだ。
subtitles.english: But I agree! That's right.

subtitles.original: 助けて会長！時計が止まっちゃう！
subtitles.english: Help us, Chairman! While the clock's running out!

subtitles.original: 助けて会長、俺たちどうしたらいい？
subtitles.english: Chairman, what should we do?

subtitles.original: アドバイスありますか？
subtitles.english: Do you have any advice?

subtitles.original: アドバイスを！
subtitles.english: We need advice!

subtitles.original: 思い切って！
subtitles.english: Just go for it!

subtitles.original: 先輩たちは皆さん優しいって知ってると思うけど。
subtitles.english: I think you already know, but all the hololive members are really nice.

subtitles.original: 皆さん話しやすくて優しい方々だから。
subtitles.english: They're really nice and approachable.

subtitles.original: 私の時は特別というか、ある意味好きに暴れられたけど。
subtitles.english: Well, it was a bit different for me at that time. I was able to run wild a bit.

subtitles.original: 今の皆さんとはちょっと状況が違うかもしれないけど。
subtitles.english: That might be a little different for you guys now.

subtitles.original: 皆さんなりのやり方で視聴者さんを楽しませてほしいな。
subtitles.english: I want you guys to entertain your viewers in your own special way.

subtitles.original: それが先輩からの最後のアドバイスかな。
subtitles.english: I suppose that is my final advice to you.

subtitles.original: うわあああ！ギリギリ攻めていきます！！
subtitles.english: We'll continue pushing that envelope!

subtitles.original: 重いよ...！
subtitles.english: The gravity...!

subtitles.original: 楽しく、楽しくやればいいんじゃないかな？
subtitles.english: If you just have fun with it, it's all good, right?

subtitles.original: 私も楽しかったからやってただけだしね。
subtitles.english: That's all I really did. Just had fun with it!

subtitles.original: いずれ新しいメンバーも入ってきて、君たちも先輩になる。
subtitles.english: You'll eventually see new members pop up, too.

subtitles.original: その時にどう後輩を導くかは、君たち次第だ。そういうわけ。
subtitles.english: And how you lead them... well, that's up to you. That's how it is.

subtitles.original: 無様な姿は見せるなよ？
subtitles.english: Don't embarrass yourself, okay?

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: わかりました！
subtitles.english: Understood!

subtitles.original: 了解！
subtitles.english: Got it!

subtitles.original: 見ててください！
subtitles.english: Please watch us!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 俺らの頑張りを見ててください！
subtitles.english: Please watch us work hard!

subtitles.original: 叫びすぎだよ！
subtitles.english: God damn, no need to bellow!

subtitles.original: それでは、5期生の皆さんでした！ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Give it up for the 5th Gen!

subtitles.original: 来てくれてありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 愛してる！
subtitles.english: I love you!
